dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 3034 RH: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place for holding court for the Western District of Washington, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. DelBene (for herself and Mr. Larsen of Washington) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on May 7, 2021

form.official-title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place for holding court for the Western District of Washington, and for other purposes.

section.text: Section 128(b) of title 28, United States Code, is amended by inserting Mount Vernon, after Tacoma,.

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
